comments.author: evilc@evilc.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16
Build Identifier: Firefox 4.0

I think Yoo Drawer is based on Moo tools, so that may be broken in some way.
Notice how in 3.x, if you hover one of the panels on the left or right of the main page, it expands to show some text as well as the icon leading to the article.
In 4.0, this no longer happens.


Reproducible: Always
